meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of eczema.
meanings.sent1: The eczematous rash on her arm was red and itchy.
meanings.sent2: Her eczematous skin required special lotion to soothe it.
meanings.sent3: The eczematous patch on his leg looked like a tiny angry cloud.
meanings.sent4: The eczematous condition of the garden reflected neglect and lack of care.
meanings.sent5: The doctor described the eczematous appearance of the skin as inflamed and irritated.

meanings.definition: Affected by or suffering from eczema.
meanings.sent1: She felt self-conscious about her eczematous hands during the presentation.
meanings.sent2: The eczematous areas on his body needed gentle care to avoid irritation.
meanings.sent3: Despite his eczematous condition, he maintained a positive attitude.
meanings.sent4: The eczematous flare-up made her skin feel like sandpaper.
meanings.sent5: The child's eczematous cheeks were rosy from scratching.
